components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ one two three
components.heading: Gain a holistic worldview of adverse events
components.html: Identifying real-world safety risks requires connecting with the real world – placing your drug life cycle data in the context of the people and products outside of your organization. With the proliferation of new technologies, varying ontologies, and evolving regulations, adverse events (AE) data continues to grow in volume and complexity. Integrating disparate data into your drug safety workflows to run accurate signal detection and prioritize case management now demands not only reliable access to siloed data sources, but confidence in the data itself.
